title: The Picture Battle Begins! Radium2 releases Picturated App for iPhone
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/8/2015 @ 2:38 PM   Picturated 
SALT LAKE CITY, Oct. 8, 2015 /PRNewswire-iReach/ -- Radium2 is proud to announce the release of Picturated - a free app available now from the App Store on iPhone. http://apple.co/1L6dRsB 
Picturated is a social sharing picture guessing game in which creativity with the picture begs others to look in to your pictures - and not just at them . 
Invite up to 10 of your friends to play against each other while guessing something in your picture -- but the clock is running so beware of those who possess time bombs, hidden mines or those who have a talent for solving word puzzles with hints. Picturated is the ultimate friend game to be played in groups with pictures on your phone. 
In Picturated , players create a game with a picture they take from their iPhone or borrow from their photo library. Once the picture has been created, cropped and captioned, it can be shared to a group who compete against the clock to solve the word puzzle. Players can strategize by using tactical weapons that impose penalties on other friends. The players who are quick to solve the word puzzle - but avoid attacks by utilizing their resources and their brains will WIN. 
About Radium2 
Radium2 is a game creator who reimagined two very popular hobbies by adding strategy and tactical maneuvers to picture taking and word puzzles. Based in Salt Lake City, Utah, Radium2 was designed and developed by entrepreneurs who wanted to create a fun game utilizing the phone camera. For more information on Radium2, visit: https://www.picturated.com
